title: LowLP gain / Massive LP Loss
body:
I recently got out of Bronze 5 for the first time in 3 years lol , not that im out im playing alot better i.e. i was on a 8 game winning streak but the thing is now that i was bronze 4 i was only getting +12-13 LP for a win and losing at least -20LP. 
Now i know all about mmr / win rate etc but I've improved my over the last couple weeks by about 7% up to 45%. 
Please riot tell me how i can go back to winning more lp then i loss becuase at the moment even after being on a 8 game win streak i lost one game and 22 LP and i was even on 99lp because of low lp gain. 
Yours Sinserly 
A troubled bronzie

replies.body: No matter what MMR you are, if you get out of a division or tier, you have the chance to be "clamped" because your mmr is lower than the tier or divison you are currently in. The only way around this is to push through it by winning more than losing. Good luck!
You will get more than you lose when you get around 50% win ratio.

Not really true, i had 65% win rate, overall and will 12+ and 22-.
how i got out was dropped from g4 to s4, (while still maintaining my winrate) and then got to s4 the wins and loss were equal.
if that makes sense, after that i climbed back up
